    • About Wayne Chang


    As founder of Wayne Chang and Associates, Wayne sets the tone for quality and professionalism in all aspects of daily business from client relations to business strategy. Wayne graduated from BYU Provo in 2006 with a BS in accounting and subsequently obtained his CPA license prior to pursuing a full-time profession as a real estate broker. Having completed over 400 transactions totaling over $200 million in volume, Wayne is able to offer his clients the best business, finance, and marketing strategies at all times.
